name: Fernstone
long_description:
Fernstone is a a full-stack AI insurance brokerage for critical indusries. We are competing directly with the 40,000 commercial insurance brokers in the US that earn $80B in revenue each year. Today, construction and industrials companies use Fernstone to obtain coverage for complex risks. 

Luke and James met at Traba (industrial staffing startup backed by Founders Fund). There, they created and led the enterprise function, growing it from 0 to 25% of company revenue, while closing customers like JB Hunt and Kimberly Clark. Bryant, Jamesâ€™ friend since high school, was a Software Engineer at Google and SentiLink; he studied Math & CS at Vanderbilt.
one_liner: Full-stack AI insurance brokerage for critical industries.
